verse: Simeon Peter, a slave and apostle of Jesus Christ, to the ones having received an equally-precious faith with us by-means-of  the righteousness of our God and Savior Jesus Christ:
May grace and peace be multiplied to you in the knowledge of God and Jesus our Lord.

header: Because of All That God Has Given Us, Diligently Add To Your Faith These God-Like Qualities

verse: Because-of His divine power having granted us all things pertaining-to life and godliness through the knowledge of the One having called us by  His own glory and virtue,

through which qualities He has granted us the precious and greatest things-promised in order that through these you might become sharers of the divine nature, having escaped-from the corruption in the world by evil desire;
and indeed for this very reason you having applied all diligence— in your faith supply virtue; and in your virtue, knowledge;
and in your knowledge, self-control; and in your self-control, endurance; and in your endurance, godliness;
and in your godliness, brotherly-love; and in your brotherly-love, love.

header: These Qualities Make You Useful And Fruitful

verse: For these qualities being-present in you and increasing make you neither useless nor unfruitful in the knowledge of our Lord Jesus Christ.
For the one in whom these qualities are not present is blind, being shortsighted, having forgotten the purification of his former sins.

header: So Be Diligent To Make Your Calling And Election Firm

verse: Therefore brothers, be more diligent to be making your calling and election firm. For while doing these things you will by no means ever stumble.
For in this manner the entrance into the eternal kingdom of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ will be richly supplied to you.

header: I Will Always Be Reminding You of These Things As Long As I Live

verse: Therefore, I will-certainly always be reminding you about these things, even though you are ones knowing and having been established in the truth being present with you.
And I regard it right for as long as I am in this [bodily] tent to be arousing you with a reminder,
knowing that the putting-off of my [bodily] tent is imminent, just as indeed our Lord Jesus Christ made-clear to me.
And I will also be diligent that at-any-time after my departure, you may have the ability to produce the memory of these things.

header: For We Were Eyewitnesses of Christ’s Majesty And Glory

verse: For we made-known to you the power and coming of our Lord Jesus Christ— not having followed-after cleverly-devised myths, but having been made eyewitnesses of the majesty of that One.
For He having received from God the Father the honor and glory of such a voice having been carried to Him by the Majestic Glory— “This is My Son, My Beloved, in Whom I was well-pleased”—
we ourselves also heard this voice having been carried out of heaven, being with Him on the holy mountain.

header: And We Have God’s Prophetic Word More Firm

verse: And we have the prophetic word as more-firm, to which you are doing well to be paying-attention as to a lamp shining in a dismal place, until which time the day dawns and the morning-star rises in your hearts,
knowing this first— that no prophecy of Scripture comes from one’s own interpretation.
For no prophecy was ever carried by the will of a human, but people being carried by the Holy Spirit spoke from God.
